question: 1. Which phrase best describes what you're looking for in a dog?

answers.name: quiz[answers][1]
answers.answer: A cuddle friend who doesn't need tons of exercise

answers.name: quiz[answers][1]
answers.answer: None of these apply/not sure yet

question: 2. What size dog are you considering?
3. What comes closest to your ideal way to spend an hour with your dog?

answers.name: quiz[answers][3]
answers.answer: Tossing a Frisbee or ball at the beach

answers.name: quiz[answers][3]
answers.answer: Meeting up with others in a dog park

answers.name: quiz[answers][3]
answers.answer: Hanging with friends at a cafe

question: 4. How smart would you like your dog to be?

answers.name: quiz[answers][4]
answers.answer: Smart enough to keep me on my toes

answers.name: quiz[answers][4]
answers.answer: Responsive, but no smarter than I am!

question: 5. How much do you exercise?

answers.name: quiz[answers][5]
answers.answer: For me, it's a walk to the fridge

question: 6. Are you looking for your dog to be a jogging companion?

answers.name: quiz[answers][6]
answers.answer: I'm just looking for a companion

question: 7. How do you tend to react when a good friend starts telling you a story you've already heard?

answers.name: quiz[answers][7]
answers.answer: Interrupt and beat her to the punchline

answers.name: quiz[answers][7]
answers.answer: Smile and nod, smile and nod

question: 8. How do you react when another driver cuts you off while you're on the highway?

answers.name: quiz[answers][8]
answers.answer: Accelerate and try to cut him off

answers.name: quiz[answers][8]
answers.answer: Lean on the horn but stay out of his way

answers.name: quiz[answers][8]
answers.answer: Slow down to give him some space

question: 9. What kind of home do you have?

answers.name: quiz[answers][9]
answers.answer: Medium-sized apartment, house, or duplex — no yard

question: 10. What kind of amusement park ride best describes the energy in your home?

answers.name: quiz[answers][10]
answers.answer: Ferris wheel (ups and downs but fairly predictable)

answers.name: quiz[answers][10]
answers.answer: Log ride (boisterous and noisy but not out of control)

answers.name: quiz[answers][10]
answers.answer: Roller coaster (sometimes a little too exciting and unpredictable)

question: 11. Are you planning to bring a new baby into your home within the next few years?
12. How old are the children in your home?

answers.name: quiz[answers][12]
answers.answer: I have children in both of the above categories

answers.name: quiz[answers][12]
answers.answer: I don't have children at home

question: 13. Are you or is someone in your household allergic to dogs?
14. Plenty of mental and physical exercise is essential for a happy dog. What arrangements are you planning to make for your dog during a typical week day?

answers.name: quiz[answers][14]
answers.answer: I'll make sure he's walked when I can't be there.

answers.name: quiz[answers][14]
answers.answer: I'll do my best to make sure he's walked, schedule permitting.

answers.name: quiz[answers][14]
answers.answer: I'm planning to leave him alone until dinnertime, when I get home.

question: 15. How would you rate your health?
16. When it comes to spiffing up your dog, you:

answers.name: quiz[answers][16]
answers.answer: Think nothing of giving him a haircut or bath as needed

answers.name: quiz[answers][16]
answers.answer: Don't mind giving him a bath, but I draw the line at haircuts

question: 17. How much does fur bother you?

answers.name: quiz[answers][17]
answers.answer: I don't mind a little fur

answers.name: quiz[answers][17]
answers.answer: I hate the idea of hair on my clothes or furniture

question: 18. How much training would you like to do?

answers.name: quiz[answers][18]
answers.answer: Teach my dog the basics but once that's done I'd like to be done

answers.name: quiz[answers][18]
answers.answer: I consider training an ongoing process

question: 19. What's your best guess at describing your future dog parenting style?

answers.name: quiz[answers][19]
answers.answer: I'm more comfortable being a buddy than a parent

answers.name: quiz[answers][19]
answers.answer: I'm prepared to set boundaries as needed but want to spend time playing with my dog, too

question: 20. Are you willing to train your dog to walk without a leash?

answers.name: quiz[answers][20]
answers.answer: I'd like to walk off-leash but don't want to spend much time training him

answers.name: quiz[answers][20]
answers.answer: It doesn't matter to me whether I can walk my dog off-leash

question: 21. How much does drooling bother you?

answers.name: quiz[answers][21]
answers.answer: Not my favorite, but I can deal with a little. Especially if it's the right dog.
